thread.title: U.S. sanctions Iranians for global cyber attacks on behalf of Tehran

title: U.S. sanctions Iranians for global cyber attacks on behalf of Tehran
text:
U.S. sanctions Iranians for global cyber attacks on behalf of Tehran Friday, March 23, 2018 - 01:08 
The United States on Friday announced criminal charges and sanctions against nine Iranians and an Iranian company for a series of cyber attacks that began in at least 2013. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The United States on Friday announced criminal charges and sanctions against nine Iranians and an Iranian company for a series of cyber attacks that began in at least 2013. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2Gfi6eJ
